LeaseCost.description: Amount of lease cost recognized by lessee for lease contract.

LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, to be Paid
LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for operating lease.

LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, to be Paid, after Year Five
LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for operating lease due after fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year One
LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for operating lease to be paid in next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year Five
LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for operating lease to be paid in fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year Four
LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for operating lease to be paid in fourth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year Three
LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for operating lease to be paid in third fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year Two
LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for operating lease to be paid in second fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityUndiscounte.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, Undiscounted Excess Amount
LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityUndiscounte.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payments in excess of discounted obligation for lease payments for operating lease.

NumberOfOperatingSegments.label: Number of Operating Segments
NumberOfOperatingSegments.description: Number of operating segments. An operating segment is a component of an enterprise: (a) that engages in business activities from which it may earn revenues and incur expenses (including revenues and expenses relating to transactions with other components of the same enterprise), (b) whose operating results are regularly reviewed by the enterprise's chief operating decision maker to make decisions about resources to be allocated to the segment and assess its performance, and (c) for which discrete financial information is available. An operating segment may engage in business activities for which it has yet to earn revenues, for example, start-up operations may be operating segments before earning revenues.

NumberOfReportingUnits.label: Number of Reporting Units
NumberOfReportingUnits.description: Number of reporting units tested for impairment of goodwill. A reporting unit is an operating segment or one level below an operating segment.

OperatingLeaseLiability.label: Operating Lease, Liability
OperatingLeaseLiability.description: Present value of lessee's discounted obligation for lease payments from operating lease.

OperatingLeaseLiabilityCurrent.label: Operating Lease, Liability, Current
OperatingLeaseLiabilityCurrent.description: Present value of lessee's discounted obligation for lease payments from operating lease, classified as current.

OperatingLeaseLiabilityNoncurrent.label: Operating Lease, Liability, Noncurrent
OperatingLeaseLiabilityNoncurrent.description: Present value of lessee's discounted obligation for lease payments from operating lease, classified as noncurrent.

OperatingLeasePayments.label: Operating Lease, Payments
OperatingLeasePayments.description: Amount of cash outflow from operating lease, excluding payments to bring another asset to condition and location necessary for its intended use.

OperatingLeaseRightOfUseAsset.label: Operating Lease, Right-of-Use Asset
OperatingLeaseRightOfUseAsset.description: Amount of lessee's right to use underlying asset under operating lease.

OperatingLeaseWeightedAverageDiscountRat.label: Operating Lease, Weighted Average Discount Rate, Percent
OperatingLeaseWeightedAverageDiscountRat.description: Weighted average discount rate for operating lease calculated at point in time.

OperatingLossCarryforwards.label: Operating Loss Carryforwards
OperatingLossCarryforwards.description: Amount of operating loss carryforward, before tax effects, available to reduce future taxable income under enacted tax laws.

OtherSellingGeneralAndAdministrativeExpe.label: Other Selling, General and Administrative Expense
OtherSellingGeneralAndAdministrativeExpe.description: Amount of selling, general and administrative expense classified as other.

PrepaidReinsurancePremiums.label: Prepaid Reinsurance Premiums
PrepaidReinsurancePremiums.description: The unexpired portion of premiums ceded on policies in force as of the balance sheet date.

ProceedsFromSaleOfAvailableForSaleSecuri.label: Proceeds from Sale of Debt Securities, Available-for-sale
ProceedsFromSaleOfAvailableForSaleSecuri.description: Amount of cash inflow from sale of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

PropertyPlantAndEquipmentGross.label: Property, Plant and Equipment, Gross
PropertyPlantAndEquipmentGross.description: Amount before accumulated depreciation, depletion and amortization of physical assets used in the normal conduct of business and not intended for resale. Examples include, but are not limited to, land, buildings, machinery and equipment, office equipment, and furniture and fixtures.

ReinsurancePayable.label: Reinsurance Payable
ReinsurancePayable.description: The carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of the known and estimated amounts owed to insurers under reinsurance treaties or other arrangements.

ReinsuranceRecoverableAllowanceForCredit.label: Reinsurance Recoverable, Allowance for Credit Loss, Recovery
ReinsuranceRecoverableAllowanceForCredit.description: Amount of increase in allowance for credit loss on reinsurance recoverable, from recovery.

ReinsuranceRecoverableForUnpaidClaimsAnd.label: Reinsurance Recoverable for Unpaid Claims and Claims Adjustments
ReinsuranceRecoverableForUnpaidClaimsAnd.description: Amount, after valuation allowance, recoverable under reinsurance contracts for losses reported to the ceding insurer but not yet paid and amounts expected for incurred losses and settlement expenses, which have not yet been reported to the ceding insurer.

RightOfUseAssetObtainedInExchangeForOper.label: Right-of-Use Asset Obtained in Exchange for Operating Lease Liability
RightOfUseAssetObtainedInExchangeForOper.description: Amount of increase in right-of-use asset obtained in exchange for operating lease liability.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Exercises in Period, Intrinsic Value
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Amount of accumulated difference between fair value of underlying shares on dates of exercise and exercise price on options exercised (or share units converted) into shares.

ShortdurationInsuranceContractsCumulativ.label: Short-duration Insurance Contracts, Cumulative Paid Claims and Allocated Claim Adjustment Expense, Net
ShortdurationInsuranceContractsCumulativ.description: Amount, after reinsurance, of paid claims and allocated claim adjustment expense used in claims development for short-duration insurance contracts. Excludes unallocated claim adjustment expense.

ShortdurationInsuranceContractsIncurredC.label: Short-duration Insurance Contracts, Incurred Claims and Allocated Claim Adjustment Expense, Net
ShortdurationInsuranceContractsIncurredC.description: Undiscounted amount, after reinsurance, of incurred claims and allocated claim adjustment expense used in claims development for short-duration insurance contracts. Excludes unallocated claim adjustment expense.

ShortdurationInsuranceContractsLiability.label: Short-duration Insurance Contracts, Liability for Unpaid Claims and Allocated Claim Adjustment Expense, Net
ShortdurationInsuranceContractsLiability.description: Undiscounted amount, after reinsurance, of the liability for unpaid claims and allocated claim adjustment expense for short-duration insurance contracts. Excludes unallocated claim adjustment expense.

ShortTermBorrowings.label: Short-term Debt
ShortTermBorrowings.description: Reflects the total carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of debt having initial terms less than one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

StatutoryAccountingPracticesStatutoryCap.label: Statutory Accounting Practices, Statutory Capital and Surplus, Balance
StatutoryAccountingPracticesStatutoryCap.description: The amount of statutory capital and surplus (stockholders' equity) as of the balance sheet date using prescribed or permitted statutory accounting practices (rather than GAAP, if different) of the state or country.

StatutoryAccountingPracticesStatutoryCap.label: Statutory Accounting Practices, Statutory Capital and Surplus Required
StatutoryAccountingPracticesStatutoryCap.description: Amount of statutory capital required to be maintained as of the balance sheet date under prescribed or permitted statutory accounting practices.

TemporaryEquityLiquidationPreference.label: Temporary Equity, Liquidation Preference
TemporaryEquityLiquidationPreference.description: The aggregate liquidation preference (or restrictions) of stock classified as temporary equity that has a preference in involuntary liquidation considerably in excess of the par or stated value of the shares. The liquidation preference is the difference between the preference in liquidation and the par or stated values of the share. Temporary equity is a security with redemption features that are outside the control of the issuer, is not classified as an asset or liability in conformity with GAAP, and is not mandatorily redeemable. Includes any type of security that is redeemable at a fixed or determinable price or on a fixed or determinable date or dates, is redeemable at the option of the holder, or has conditions for redemption which are not solely within the control of the issuer. If convertible, the issuer does not control the actions or events necessary to issue the maximum number of shares that could be required to be delivered under the conversion option if the holder exercises the option to convert the stock to another class of equity. If the security is a warrant or a rights issue, the warrant or rights issue is considered to be temporary equity if the issuer cannot demonstrate that it would be able to deliver upon the exercise of the option by the holder in all cases. Includes stock with put option held by ESOP and stock redeemable by holder only in the event of a change in control of the issuer.

TemporaryEquityShareSubscriptions.label: Temporary Equity, Share Subscriptions
TemporaryEquityShareSubscriptions.description: The number of securities classified as temporary equity that have been allocated to investors to buy. Temporary equity is a security with redemption features that are outside the control of the issuer, is not classified as an asset or liability in conformity with GAAP, and is not mandatorily redeemable. Includes any type of security that is redeemable at a fixed or determinable price or on a fixed or determinable date or dates, is redeemable at the option of the holder, or has conditions for redemption which are not solely within the control of the issuer. If convertible, the issuer does not control the actions or events necessary to issue the maximum number of shares that could be required to be delivered under the conversion option if the holder exercises the option to convert the stock to another class of equity. If the security is a warrant or a rights issue, the warrant or rights issue is considered to be temporary equity if the issuer cannot demonstrate that it would be able to deliver upon the exercise of the option by the holder in all cases. Includes stock with put option held by ESOP and stock redeemable by holder only in the event of a change in control of the issuer.

TreasuryStockShares.label: Treasury Stock, Shares
TreasuryStockShares.description: Number of common and preferred shares that were previously issued and that were repurchased by the issuing entity and held in treasury on the financial statement date. This stock has no voting rights and receives no dividends.

TreasuryStockValue.label: Treasury Stock, Value
TreasuryStockValue.description: The amount allocated to treasury stock. Treasury stock is common and preferred shares of an entity that were issued, repurchased by the entity, and are held in its treasury.

EquitySecuritiesFvNiUnrealizedLoss.label: Equity Securities, FV-NI, Unrealized Loss
EquitySecuritiesFvNiUnrealizedLoss.description: Amount of unrealized loss on investment in equity security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (FV-NI).

ImpairmentOfIntangibleAssetsFinitelived.label: Impairment of Intangible Assets, Finite-lived
ImpairmentOfIntangibleAssetsFinitelived.description: The amount of impairment loss recognized in the period resulting from the write-down of the carrying amount of a finite-lived intangible asset to fair value.

LettersOfCreditOutstandingAmount.label: Letters of Credit Outstanding, Amount
LettersOfCreditOutstandingAmount.description: The total amount of the contingent obligation under letters of credit outstanding as of the reporting date.

RepaymentsOfLinesOfCredit.label: Repayments of Lines of Credit
RepaymentsOfLinesOfCredit.description: Amount of cash outflow for payment of an obligation from a lender, including but not limited to, letter of credit, standby letter of credit and revolving credit arrangements.

RevenueNotFromContractWithCustomer.label: Revenue Not from Contract with Customer
RevenueNotFromContractWithCustomer.description: Amount of revenue that is not accounted for under Topic 606.

TemporaryEquityAccretionToRedemptionValu.label: Temporary Equity, Accretion to Redemption Value
TemporaryEquityAccretionToRedemptionValu.description: Value of accretion of temporary equity to its redemption value during the period.

TemporaryEquityLiquidationPreferencePerS.label: Temporary Equity, Liquidation Preference Per Share
TemporaryEquityLiquidationPreferencePerS.description: The per share liquidation preference (or restrictions) of stock classified as temporary equity that has a preference in involuntary liquidation considerably in excess of the par or stated value of the shares. The liquidation preference is the difference between the preference in liquidation and the par or stated values of the share. Temporary equity is a security with redemption features that are outside the control of the issuer, is not classified as an asset or liability in conformity with GAAP, and is not mandatorily redeemable. Includes any type of security that is redeemable at a fixed or determinable price or on a fixed or determinable date or dates, is redeemable at the option of the holder, or has conditions for redemption which are not solely within the control of the issuer. If convertible, the issuer does not control the actions or events necessary to issue the maximum number of shares that could be required to be delivered under the conversion option if the holder exercises the option to convert the stock to another class of equity. If the security is a warrant or a rights issue, the warrant or rights issue is considered to be temporary equity if the issuer cannot demonstrate that it would be able to deliver upon the exercise of the option by the holder in all cases. Includes stock with put option held by ESOP and stock redeemable by holder only in the event of a change in control of the issuer.

TemporaryEquityRedemptionPricePerShare.label: Temporary Equity, Redemption Price Per Share
TemporaryEquityRedemptionPricePerShare.description: Amount to be paid per share that is classified as temporary equity by entity upon redemption. Temporary equity is a security with redemption features that are outside the control of the issuer, is not classified as an asset or liability in conformity with GAAP, and is not mandatorily redeemable. Includes any type of security that is redeemable at a fixed or determinable price or on a fixed or determinable date or dates, is redeemable at the option of the holder, or has conditions for redemption which are not solely within the control of the issuer. If convertible, the issuer does not control the actions or events necessary to issue the maximum number of shares that could be required to be delivered under the conversion option if the holder exercises the option to convert the stock to another class of equity. If the security is a warrant or a rights issue, the warrant or rights issue is considered to be temporary equity if the issuer cannot demonstrate that it would be able to deliver upon the exercise of the option by the holder in all cases. Includes stock with put option held by ESOP and stock redeemable by holder only in the event of a change in control of the issuer.

OtherOperatingIncomeExpenseNet.label: Other Operating Income (Expense), Net
OtherOperatingIncomeExpenseNet.description: The net amount of other operating income and expenses, the components of which are not separately disclosed on the income statement, from items that are associated with the entity's normal revenue producing operations.

EquitySecuritiesFvNiRealizedGain.label: Equity Securities, FV-NI, Realized Gain
EquitySecuritiesFvNiRealizedGain.description: Amount of realized gain from sale of investment in equity security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (FV-NI).

ImpairmentOfIntangibleAssetsExcludingGoo.label: Impairment of Intangible Assets (Excluding Goodwill)
ImpairmentOfIntangibleAssetsExcludingGoo.description: The amount of impairment loss recognized in the period resulting from the write-down of the carrying amount of an intangible asset (excluding goodwill) to fair value.

LineOfCreditFacilityInterestRateDuringPe.label: Line of Credit Facility, Interest Rate During Period
LineOfCreditFacilityInterestRateDuringPe.description: The effective interest rate during the reporting period.

PaymentsToMinorityShareholders.label: Payments to Noncontrolling Interests
PaymentsToMinorityShareholders.description: Amount of cash outflow to a noncontrolling interest. Includes, but not limited to, reduction of noncontrolling interest ownership. Excludes dividends paid to the noncontrolling interest.

AssetsOfDisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinu.label: Disposal Group, Including Discontinued Operation, Assets, Current
AssetsOfDisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinu.description: Amount classified as assets attributable to disposal group held for sale or disposed of, expected to be disposed of within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

DeferredTaxAssetsUnrealizedLossesOnAvail.label: Deferred Tax Assets, Unrealized Losses on Available-for-Sale Securities, Gross
DeferredTaxAssetsUnrealizedLossesOnAvail.description: Amount before allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences from unrealized losses on available-for-sale securities.

DefinedContributionPlanEmployerMatchingC.label: Defined Contribution Plan, Employer Matching Contribution, Percent of Employees' Gross Pay
DefinedContributionPlanEmployerMatchingC.description: Percentage of employees' gross pay for which the employer contributes a matching contribution to a defined contribution plan.

DepreciationAndAmortization.label: Depreciation, Depletion and Amortization, Nonproduction
DepreciationAndAmortization.description: The current period expense charged against earnings on long-lived, physical assets not used in production, and which are not intended for resale, to allocate or recognize the cost of such assets over their useful lives; or to record the reduction in book value of an intangible asset over the benefit period of such asset; or to reflect consumption during the period of an asset that is not used in production.

DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperat.label: Disposal Group, Including Discontinued Operation, Assets, Noncurrent
DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperat.description: Amount classified as assets attributable to disposal group held for sale or disposed of, expected to be disposed of after one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperat.label: Disposal Group, Including Discontinued Operation, Depreciation and Amortization
DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperat.description: Amount of depreciation and amortization expense attributable to disposal group, including, but not limited to, discontinued operation.

DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperat.label: Disposal Group, Including Discontinued Operation, Interest Expense
DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperat.description: Amount of interest expense attributable to disposal group, including, but not limited to, discontinued operation.

DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperat.label: Disposal Group, Including Discontinued Operation, Operating Expense
DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperat.description: Amount of operating expense attributable to disposal group, including, but not limited to, discontinued operation.

DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperat.label: Disposal Group, Including Discontinued Operation, Revenue
DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperat.description: Amount of revenue attributable to disposal group, including, but not limited to, discontinued operation.

GainLossOnInvestments.label: Gain (Loss) on Investments
GainLossOnInvestments.description: Amount of realized and unrealized gain (loss) on investment.

GoodwillImpairmentLossNetOfTax.label: Goodwill, Impairment Loss, Net of Tax
GoodwillImpairmentLossNetOfTax.description: Amount after tax of loss recognized that results from the write-down of an asset representing the future economic benefits arising from other assets acquired in a business combination that are not individually identified and separately recognized.

GoodwillTransfers.label: Goodwill, Transfers
GoodwillTransfers.description: Amount of transfers into (out of) an asset representing the future economic benefits arising from other assets acquired in a business combination that are not individually identified and separately recognized.

ImpairmentOfLongLivedAssetsToBeDisposedO.label: Impairment of Long-Lived Assets to be Disposed of
ImpairmentOfLongLivedAssetsToBeDisposedO.description: The aggregate amount of write-downs for impairments recognized during the period for long-lived assets held for abandonment, exchange or sale.

IncomeLossFromContinuingOperations.label: Income (Loss) from Continuing Operations, Net of Tax, Attributable to Parent
IncomeLossFromContinuingOperations.description: Amount after tax of income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to the parent.

IncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsAttrib.label: Income (Loss) from Continuing Operations, Net of Tax, Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
IncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsAttrib.description: Amount after tax of income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to the noncontrolling interest.

IncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsInclud.label: Income (Loss) from Continuing Operations, Net of Tax, Including Portion Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
IncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsInclud.description: Amount after tax of income (loss) from continuing operations including portion attributable to the noncontrolling interest.

IncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsPerBas.label: Income (Loss) from Continuing Operations, Per Basic Share
IncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsPerBas.description: The amount of net income (loss) from continuing operations per each share of common stock or unit outstanding during the reporting period.

IncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsPerDil.label: Income (Loss) from Continuing Operations, Per Diluted Share
IncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsPerDil.description: The amount of net income (loss) derived from continuing operations during the period available to each share of common stock or common unit outstanding during the reporting period and to each share or unit that would have been outstanding assuming the issuance of common shares or units for all dilutive potential common shares or units outstanding during the reporting period.

IncomeLossFromDiscontinuedOperationsNetO.label: Income (Loss) from Discontinued Operations, Net of Tax, Attributable to Parent
IncomeLossFromDiscontinuedOperationsNetO.description: Amount after tax of income (loss) from a discontinued operation attributable to the parent. Includes, but is not limited to, the income (loss) from operations during the phase-out period, gain (loss) on disposal, gain (loss) for reversal of write-down (write-down) to fair value, less cost to sell, and adjustments to a prior period gain (loss) on disposal.

IncomeLossFromDiscontinuedOperationsNetO.label: Income (Loss) from Discontinued Operations and Disposal of Discontinued Operations, Net of Tax, Per Basic Share
IncomeLossFromDiscontinuedOperationsNetO.description: Per basic share amount, after tax, of income (loss) from the day-to-day business activities of the discontinued operation and gain (loss) from the disposal of the discontinued operation.

IncomeLossFromDiscontinuedOperationsNetO.label: Income (Loss) from Discontinued Operations and Disposal of Discontinued Operations, Net of Tax, Per Diluted Share
IncomeLossFromDiscontinuedOperationsNetO.description: Per diluted share amount, after tax, of income (loss) from the day-to-day business activities of the discontinued operation and gain (loss) from the disposal of the discontinued operation.

IncomeTaxReconciliationNondeductibleExpe.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Nondeductible Expense, Impairment Losses, Amount
IncomeTaxReconciliationNondeductibleExpe.description: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to nondeductible impairment loss.

IncomeTaxReconciliationNondeductibleExpe.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Nondeductible Expense, Other, Amount
IncomeTaxReconciliationNondeductibleExpe.description: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to other nondeductible expenses.

IncomeTaxReconciliationNondeductibleExpe.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Nondeductible Expense, Share-based Payment Arrangement, Amount
IncomeTaxReconciliationNondeductibleExpe.description: Amount of reported income tax expense (benefit) in excess of (less than) expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying domestic federal statutory income tax rate to pretax income (loss) from continuing operation, attributable to nondeductible expense for award under share-based payment arrangement. Includes, but is not limited to, expense determined to be nondeductible upon grant or after for award under share-based payment arrangement.

LiabilitiesOfDisposalGroupIncludingDisco.label: Disposal Group, Including Discontinued Operation, Liabilities, Current
LiabilitiesOfDisposalGroupIncludingDisco.description: Amount classified as liabilities attributable to disposal group held for sale or disposed of, expected to be disposed of within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

LossContingencyDamagesPaidValue.label: Loss Contingency, Damages Paid, Value
LossContingencyDamagesPaidValue.description: Amount of damages paid to the plaintiff in the legal matter.

MinorityInterestDecreaseFromDistribution.label: Noncontrolling Interest, Decrease from Distributions to Noncontrolling Interest Holders
MinorityInterestDecreaseFromDistribution.description: Decrease in noncontrolling interest balance from payment of dividends or other distributions by the non-wholly owned subsidiary or partially owned entity, included in the consolidation of the parent entity, to the noncontrolling interest holders.

NetIncomeLossIncludingPortionAttributabl.label: Net Income (Loss), Including Portion Attributable to Nonredeemable Noncontrolling Interest
NetIncomeLossIncludingPortionAttributabl.description: Amount after income tax of income (loss) including the portion attributable to nonredeemable noncontrolling interest. Excludes the portion attributable to redeemable noncontrolling interest recognized as temporary equity.

PaymentsForRestructuring.label: Payments for Restructuring
PaymentsForRestructuring.description: Amount of cash payments made as the result of exit or disposal activities. Excludes payments associated with a discontinued operation or an asset retirement obligation.

RestructuringCharges.label: Restructuring Charges
RestructuringCharges.description: Amount of expenses associated with exit or disposal activities pursuant to an authorized plan. Excludes expenses related to a discontinued operation or an asset retirement obligation.

RestructuringReserve.label: Restructuring Reserve
RestructuringReserve.description: Carrying amount (including both current and noncurrent portions of the accrual) as of the balance sheet date pertaining to a specified type of cost associated with exit from or disposal of business activities or restructuring pursuant to a duly authorized plan.

RestructuringReserveAccrualAdjustment1.label: Restructuring Reserve, Accrual Adjustment
RestructuringReserveAccrualAdjustment1.description: Amount of expense (reversal of expense) which increases (decreases) the restructuring reserve from an adjustment to a previously accrued restructuring liability.

SeveranceCosts1.label: Severance Costs
SeveranceCosts1.description: Amount of expenses for special or contractual termination benefits provided to current employees involuntarily terminated under a benefit arrangement associated exit or disposal activities pursuant to an authorized plan. Excludes expenses related to one-time termination benefits, a discontinued operation or an asset retirement obligation.

TreasuryStockCommonShares.label: Treasury Stock, Common, Shares
TreasuryStockCommonShares.description: Number of previously issued common shares repurchased by the issuing entity and held in treasury.

TreasuryStockCommonValue.label: Treasury Stock, Common, Value
TreasuryStockCommonValue.description: Amount allocated to previously issued common shares repurchased by the issuing entity and held in treasury.

UnusedCommitmentsToExtendCredit.label: Unused Commitments to Extend Credit
UnusedCommitmentsToExtendCredit.description: Unused amount of commitments to extend credit to customers.
